violations.description: Ensure ARIA attributes are not prohibited for an element's role
violations.help: Elements must only use permitted ARIA attributes

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  aria-labelledby attribute cannot be used on a div with no valid role attribute.

violations.description: Ensure that every form element has a visible label and is not solely labeled using hidden labels, or the title or aria-describedby attributes
violations.help: Form elements should have a visible label

nodes.html: <input accesskey="4" id="search" name="searchQuery" type="search" class="searchField" data-lang="nb" title="Skriv inn hva du vil søke på" placeholder="Søk">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Only title used to generate label for form element

violations.description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
violations.help: Page should contain a level-one heading

nodes.html: <html class=" js csscolumns svg inlinesvg svgclippaths" lang="nb">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Page must have a level-one heading

violations.description: Ensure all page content is contained by landmarks
violations.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Some page content is not contained by landmarks
